column2: we have to wait to get into a restaurant? What is this
column3: San Francisco?? That just shows how popular weekend brunch at Baby Barnaby's Cafe is. For the virgins
column4: you have to write your name on the list when you arrive. Food is delicious. Would choose to have brunch here over Breakfast Klub anytime because there is a seated waiting area and the wait is shorter (15-20 min depending on time
column5: compared to 45 minutes at Breakfast Klub!) A nice place to bring out-of-town-ers but only if you are not in a rush.
